segments.text: This scene is just a cascade of potential accidents, it's quite alarming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The most immediate danger I see is that poor boy on the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's tilted precariously, its legs splayed out in an unstable way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm terrified it's going to tip over at any second, sending him crashing down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And he's reaching, straining for those cookies, completely oblivious to his own unstable perch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then there's the woman, standing in a growing puddle of water from the overflowing sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's drying dishes, completely unaware of the watery mess around her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone could easily slip and get seriously hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinets and floor are definitely going to suffer water damage.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's just a recipe for disaster on multiple fronts.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish there was some way to yell out a warning.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This entire situation is incredibly stressful to witness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a really bad situation waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR
